Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH], [WEAPON] or [TALENT] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH], [WEAPON] or [TALENT] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. Whenever you attack a ship of that Faction, you may roll 1 less attack die to add 1 [CRIT] result to your roll. Each time you defend against a ship of that Faction, roll +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: Salatrel
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, after Setup, choose 1 Faction. For the rest of the game, during each Combat Phase, if a ship of that Faction is in your forward firing arc, treat your Captain Skill Number as if it were a 10 until the End Phase of that round.

Captain.Title: Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

Captain.Title: Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 1 Drone Token on this card.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] or [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar (your choice). ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Chakotay
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] or [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade bar (your choice). ACTION: Perform a 2nd Maneuver on your Maneuver Dial with a number of 3 or less. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If the extra Maneuver is a Red Maneuver, place a 2nd Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH], [WEAPON] or [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Calvin Hudson
Captain.Ability: Add 1 [TECH], [WEAPON] or [CREW] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar (your choice). If this card is assigned to an Independent ship, all of your Upgrades cost -1 SP.

Captain.Title: Tactical Drone
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 5 Drone Tokens on this card. During the Roll Defense Dice step of the Combat Phase, you may spend 1 of your Drone Tokens to force your opponent to roll 1 less defense die.
